name: 3D Platformer (BelindaLourey)
description:
3D Platformer Game, on your PC. This cool little demon guy can run through this fun and interactive world. The world is made up of floating islands and Strange brick houses with a bit of sorcery.  Collect coins, Gems & magic stones that are used as keys so you can open doors or gain the ability to boost jump.  Don’t fall off the platforms, touch the poison or fire! you will be sent back to the checkpoints.  Find as many coins & gems as you can to get the best score. finish the level by getting the trophy stone. This 3D Platformer Game Can be played on a Windows Desktop computer or Laptop with the following controls. Keyboard: W,A,S,D or Arrow keys - Move Forward, Backward, Left & Right. Spacebar - Jump  Mouse - Camera View  E key - Will allow you to use the key to unlock the Door only if you have the key stone.   ESC Key - Exit Xbox windows Controller: 

A Controller can be used depending on your operating system. 

Left Thumb-stick - Move Forward, Backward, Left & Right.  Right Thumb-stick - Camera View  A Button - Jump   B Button - Will allow you to use the key to unlock the Door only if you have the key stone.  Triggers Left and Right - Camera View ESC Key - Exit
